title: Line Of Action
description: Lines of Action is a board game, of the same general type as Chess, Go, or Othello. LOA was invented by Claude Soucie, and described in A Gamut of Games by Sid Sackson. I made this game for my Artificial Intelligence assignment which is taught in my undergraduate course curriculum.

title: Online Judge - Java Based FTP Project
description: Here, we build an online programming code compiler & judging desktop application. We use Java & JavaFX. Here a user uploads their C or Java code file to the local server for a specific programming problem and the server gives a verdict (eg. Accepted / Run time error / Syntax error) based on their code.

title: Angry Birds - C & IGraphics Project
description: This is my very first project. In this project, we build an angry birds game with C and IGraphics. Here a player can shoot a wall with an angry bird's face. All players' scores saved in a point's table.

title: Food Advisor - Database Management Project
description: In this project, we build a PHP based web application with a PostgreSQL database. This web application runs on the local server. This application is a Food Blog where users can share their food experiences from different restaurants. Based on their rating, users' home page & restaurants' home page shows most popular food items. All the data are saved & updated in local database.

title: Shooting Game - Micro Controller Project
description: Here, we build a microcontroller circuit with two Bluetooth sensors where two players can play shooting game on the led matrix board with the phone apps.

title: Nachos Operating System
description: In this project, we build some important functionality of a mini operating system called Nachos-Not Another Completely Heuristic Operating System. We implement multi programming & threading for this os.
